requirements_en.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: WindowsR 7/8/8.1/10 (32bit/64bit)
  • Processor: Intel Core2 Duo or better
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: DirectX 9/OpenGL 4.1 capable GPU
  • DirectX: Version 9.0
  • Storage: 500 MB available space
  • Additional Notes: 1280x768 or better
requirements_en.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: WindowsR 10 (32bit/64bit)
  • Processor: Intel Core i3 or better
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: OpenGL ES 2.0 hardware driver support required for WebGL acceleration
  • DirectX: Version 9.0
  • Storage: 1 GB available space
  • Additional Notes: 1280x768 or better
